about_the_game:
ABOUT STORY
Having completed her education at the monastery, Princess Asteria returns to her country and finds that her Virtuous Kingdom has been destroyed.
The sorcerer of the Saban Kingdom named Dragos invades the kingdom with his army.
The Sorceress invades the Virtous Kingdom and traps Astreia on her own continent.
Asteria embarks on an adventure to get her revenge and her kingdom back. Mearth II is the sequel to the first game.
An adventure awaits you, be prepared for difficult challenges and roads.

Key Features


  • Spells and magical weapons : Use your magical powers and weapons to beat enemies and bosses, as well as pass levels
      • Stealth executions : You can sneak behind some enemies and kill them also kill enemies with finishing execution hits in some fights
      • Fight your way : Define your own playstyle, and prepare for the challenges that await in your own unique way
      • Brutal enemies and bosses : You will not get bored while fighting bosses with different characteristics. While battling ruthless enemies, you can dodge their attacks with your skill
      • Majestic structures and dangerous roads : Get ready for spectacular and atmospheric maps that will keep you in the game, but beware of the traps on the roads you walk
      • Obstacles and puzzles : Solve puzzles and dodge obstacles to progress through caves
      • Witness a story : Explore the dark and magical story of the Mearth universe with Asteria.

content_descriptors.notes: The game may feature blood and violence during gameplay.
